Carousel images for the homepage hero.

Put your images here, e.g.:
  slide1.jpg
  slide2.jpg
  slide3.jpg
  slide4.jpg

Recommended size: 1920Ã—600 (aspect 1920/600). Any size works with object-cover.

Then in code (src/components/home/HeroCarousel.tsx), set imageSrc on each slide:
  imageSrc: '/assets/carousel/slide1.jpg'
  imageSrc: '/assets/carousel/slide2.jpg'
  etc.
